^确定退出吗？\\s+:
Sigurado ka na ba sa pag-alis?
Hindi maitatala ang iyong progreso!
Maliban sa Survival Mode.
^自定义关卡使用条款，开发者在此声明：\\s+:
<size=11>Custom Level Terms of Use, Developer's Statement:
Custom levels are created by players themselves. If a map violates laws or regulations, or infringes on the rights of others, please immediately exit and delete the level. Playing the level implies that the player agrees to bear any risks and responsibilities associated with using custom levels.
^地图编辑器使用条款，开发者在此声明：\\s+:
<size=11>Map Editor Terms of Use, Developer's Statement:
The editor is only for normal level creation use. Any behavior that violates laws and regulations or infringes on the rights of others is strictly prohibited. Players agree to assume the risks and responsibilities associated with using the editor.
^按Tab切换鼠标位置格子类型\\s+:
Press Tab to switch the mouse grid type.
Hold A or D and move the mouse to switch to grass or dirt.
Press C to save; the saved level will take effect in Custom Level.
^保存关卡完毕！前往自定义关卡游玩\\s+:
<size=14>Level saved successfully! Go to Custom Level to play it.
You can also share the levels you created with your friends to challenge them.
The location of the level file is as here:
C:\Users\[Your Username]\AppData\LocalLow\LanPiaoPiao\PlantsVsZombiesRH\CustomBlock.json</size>
^保存成功，前往我是僵尸的自定义关卡游玩\\s+:
<size=14>Level saved successfully! Go to Custom Level of I, Zombie to play it.
The zombies that can be used in the level is the zombies that are currently on the loadout, and the initial Sun is the Sun currently on the level.
The name of the file level is CustomIZ.json.
^任务目标：在(\\d+)秒内击杀(\\d+)个僵尸\\s+任务奖励：究极加农炮:
Current Mission: Kill {1} zombies within {0} seconds
Completion Reward: Cob-livion Cannon x1
^任务目标：在(\\d+)秒内击杀(\\d+)个僵尸\\s+任务奖励：解锁全部究:
Current Mission: Kill {1} zombies within {0} seconds
Completion Reward: Unlock all Odyssey Fusions
^作战植物已达上限(\\d+)/(\\d+): Max Amount of Plants in Combat Reached: {0}/{1}
^参战植物数量增加到(\\d+): Number of Plants in Combat Increased to {0}
^补给已到达，参战植物数量增加到(\\d+): Reinforcements Are Here! Plants in Combat Increased to {0}
^请按左中右的顺序放置以下植物\\s+([^\\s]+)，([^\\s]+)，(:
Please place the following plants in order
{0}, {1}, {2}
-------Outdated Regex Below: You Can Safely Ignore or Delete-------
^按F键切换全屏\\s+局内按Esc键暂停游戏\\s+:

Difficulty 4/5 = Cremator ay hindi magbabalewala ng armor
Difficulty 4 = 30% DMG Reduction
Difficulty 5 = 60% DMG Reduction, -50% Charm Probability</size>
